• 2D multiplayer mining game with real-time multiplayer, procedural world generation, and local save system.
  • Features include: drilling, building, trading, admin controls, shop upgrades, and cross-device cloud sync.
  • Mobile-optimized with touch controls, responsive UI, and in-game chat system.
  • Uses MQTT for networking, IndexedDB for local saves, and Puter SDK for cloud storage.
  • Advanced rendering with day/night cycles, particle effects, and detailed tile textures.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer 2D mining game featuring real-time networking, procedural world generation, and comprehensive save systems. Players can drill, build, trade, and upgrade their mining equipment while exploring a vast underground world with day/night cycles and detailed graphics. The game supports both desktop and mobile play with responsive controls and includes admin features, in-game chat, and cloud synchronization across devices.
